useEffect(()=>{const history=localStorage.getItem('searchHistory');if(history){setSearchHistory(JSON.parse(history));}},[]);// 保存搜索历史到localStorage
const saveSearchHistory=history=>{localStorage.setItem('searchHistory',JSON.stringify(history));setSearchHistory(history);};// 添加搜索历史
const addToHistory=value=>{if(!value.trim())return;// 移除重复项并将新项放在最前面
const newHistory=[value,...searchHistory.filter(item=>item!==value)].slice(0,MAX_HISTORY);saveSearchHistory(newHistory);};// 清除单个搜索历史

navigate(`/search?keyword=${encodeURIComponent(searchKeyword)}`);// 关闭下拉菜单
setVisible(false);// 如果有自定义搜索回调，也执行它
if(onSearch){onSearch(searchKeyword);}}};// 搜索下拉菜单内容
